channel.title: Write On
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.title: Version 3.0.0
item.description:
Write On 3.0 — Universal Binary, Bluetooth-Safe Audio

  • Universal Binary — runs natively on Apple Silicon and Intel Macs
  • Now supports macOS 12 (Monterey) and later
  • Replaced Metal rendering with lightweight Core Animation overlay
  • Bluetooth-safe audio — automatically uses built-in mic, headphones stay in music mode
  • AES-256-GCM encrypted transcript history (auto-migrates from v2.x)
  • Audio ring buffer captures first words during connection
  • Improved waveform visualization with noise gate tuning

item.title: Version 2.1.0
item.description:
Write On 2.1 — Getting Started Dashboard & Payments

  • New 4-section onboarding dashboard after sign-in
  • Menu bar icon flash to guide new users
  • Stripe payment integration for Pro and Lifetime plans
  • Fixed OAuth bridge page for more reliable sign-in
  • OAuth cache-buster prevents stale state errors
  • Fixed language selection not applying to transcription

item.title: Version 2.0.0
item.description:
Write On 2.0 — Accounts, History, and More

  • User accounts with email/password login
  • Free tier (15 min/month) and Pro subscriptions
  • Transcript history — access your last 20 transcripts from the menu bar
  • Encrypted on-device storage for all transcripts
  • 20+ language support
  • Connection resilience — auto-reconnect if connection drops
  • Overlay follows mouse across monitors
  • Preferences window with customizable hotkeys
  • Paragraph formatting for longer dictations
